amendment.description: Amendment outlines the procedure for resolution of disparate allocations as it relates to the distribution of funds to State and local governments under the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new paragraph which outlines the procedure for resolution of disparate allocations as it relates to the distribution of funds to state and local governments under the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chabot amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
